mapper.select: SELECT T.ID, T.USER_ID, T.SUPERIOR_ID, T.NAME, T.IS_AUDIT, T.JOIN_TIME, T.AMOUNT_AVAILABLE, T.AMOUNT_WITHDRAWN, T.AMOUNT_TOTAL, T.INVITATION_CODE, U.NICKNAME, U.HEAD_IMG_URL, UU.NICKNAME SUPERIOR_NICKNAME FROM MALL_DIST T JOIN MALL_USER U ON T.USER_ID = U.ID LEFT JOIN MALL_DIST TT ON T.SUPERIOR_ID = TT.ID LEFT JOIN MALL_USER UU ON TT.USER_ID = UU.ID WHERE T.ID = #{id}

SELECT T.ID, T.USER_ID, T.SUPERIOR_ID, T.NAME, T.IS_AUDIT, T.JOIN_TIME, T.AMOUNT_AVAILABLE, T.AMOUNT_WITHDRAWN, T.AMOUNT_TOTAL, T.INVITATION_CODE, U.NICKNAME, U.HEAD_IMG_URL, UU.NICKNAME SUPERIOR_NICKNAME FROM MALL_DIST T JOIN MALL_USER U ON T.USER_ID = U.ID LEFT JOIN MALL_DIST TT ON T.SUPERIOR_ID = TT.ID LEFT JOIN MALL_USER UU ON TT.USER_ID = UU.ID WHERE T.USER_ID = #{userId}
